newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria's Scala ECE to seek NASDAQ listing.
newsitem.headline: Austria's Scala ECE to seek NASDAQ listing.

text.p: Austrian business systems company Scala ECE said on Thursday it would seek a listing on the NASDAQ stock exchange in New York this year.

"A listing on NASDAQ will further enhance our ability to seek IT investors and partners in the United States and worldwide. This further underscores our overall strategy of aggressive expansion and growth in emerging markets worldwide," Scala ECE chief executive Andreas Kemi said in a statement.

Scala ECE, which provides companies in emerging markets with business systems and services, is active in Eastern and Central Europe, the CIS, Central Asia, Turkey and the Middle East. -- Vienna Newsroom, 43-1-53112-254
